text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: The day of the tryouts finally arrives.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Lotus roots, celery stalks, spinach<n>leaves... Lotus roots,
celery stalks,<n>spinach leaves...
choice_data_list: Is that some kind of incantation?
Is that some kind of incantation?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
It's for good luck! This chant will<n>allow me to focus my
willpower and<n>perform to the best of my ability!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: I've trained as much as I could!Regardless of how this race turns out,I will make you my trainer!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Howdy, Fukukitaru! How ya feelin'?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Um... We'd like to watch you run<n>today, if you don't mind.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Oh! Taiki, Suzuka! Are you here to<n>cheer for me?! It's nice
knowing the<n>two of you've got my back!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
It's been a busy couple of weeks,<n>but I think I'm ready,
thanks to you<n>guys!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Don't even mention it! Tear up that<n>racetrack! Show 'em
what you've<n>got! Don't worry about Suzuka and<n>me.
We'll be making our debut soon<n>enough too!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Sorry for the head start, you two! See<n>you at the Twinkle
Series!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
All right, then... It's about time I head<n>out. I'll try not to lose
too hard!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Yeah, give it your— Wait, what?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Thanks! Be back soon!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Um... Does she intend on losing or<n>something?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The race soon commences, and<n>Matikanefukukitaru blasts
out of the<n>starting gate.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
This much-awaited race is completely<n>packed with
extremely skilled runners!<n>Who will come out on top?!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Matikanefukukitaru is falling behind!<n>Are the leading
Umamusume too fast<n>for her?!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Mgrrrgh! They're all... so fast...

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
That's fine though. I just need to do<n>what I promised I
would—run!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Let's goooo! Super Fortune<n>Daaaaash!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The runners have made their final<n>turn and are entering the
final stretch!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Matikanefukukitaru is picking up the<n>pace from behind! Will
she be able to<n>close the gap?!

text_block_list.name: Spectators
text_block_list.text: Yeeeaaah!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Maaan, I thought for a second there<n>that I could overtake
them all... How'd<n>I still end up in last place?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Still, you were so close... Had you<n>another fifty meters, you
would've<n>easily cleared the whole group.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
I know, right?! You might've been<n>last, but you definitely
had the biggest<n>impact!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Awww, you guys are being too nice.

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Ah, Matikanefukukitaru! There you<n>are! Please, let me scout
you!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Huh? You want to... scout me?

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
That burst of speed during the last leg<n>of the race was a
sight to behold! I'm<n>positive that you and I can accomplish<n>
anything together!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer B
text_block_list.text: No, she needs my guidance! I'llbe the one to scout her!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Waaah! Why are all these people<n>coming to me? I was in
last place!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Sorry, but destiny has already<n>decided my trainer!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Matikanefukukitaru politely declines<n>the offers from the
trainers around her<n>and looks my way.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her belief in divinations is unrivaled,<n>and it goes without
saying she's a<n>real character. Yet I can tell she loves<n>
running more than anything.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Ummm... I'm not very good under<n>pressure. Whenever I get
nervous, I<n>feel like I'll start babbling some<n>random
incantation at any moment...
choice_data_list: Let's create our own good fortune!
Let's create our own good fortune!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Whoa! Now that's more like it! Good<n>fortune doesn't just
come to those<n>who wait around doing nothing! Let's<n>do
this!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With tryouts behind us, I officially take<n>on the role of
Matikanefukukitaru's<n>trainer.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: So how about we get started? Not a<n>second to waste!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Hm, actually... Before we begin, could<n>I ask you one small
favor?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
I was doing a carrot divination earlier,<n>and it said that partner
running would<n>be today's lucky activity. Problem is,<n>
Suzuka's busy today...

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Could you run with me today?!<n>Please, just this once!
choice_data_list: Our paces wouldn't match at all!
Our paces wouldn't match at all!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
No worries! If you start falling behind,<n>I'll just drag you
along! So let's<n>goooo!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Before I can even begin to question<n>my decisions thus far,
she takes off<n>running, leaving me with no choice but<n>to
frantically attempt to keep up.
